system.description:
This Tiny, ethereal, mottled-brown goblinoid is contained in a spice jar. It wears a stained apron, carries an appropriately-sized set of cooking utensils, and has a perpetually annoyed look on its face.

Once per day, you may instruct the gremlin to prepare a meal of your choosing. Regardless of what meal you request, the sous chef gremlin only knows how to prepare potato crisps. If you complain about the meal, the gremlin berates you. The gremlin’s “meal” prepared in this way counts as one Supply, but really it’s mostly just empty calories.
